name: QuickSetCloudVideo
0:
”Alexa, tune to CNN”
”Alexa, launch Netflix on Roku”
skdetail:
Video Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can now use Amazon Alexa with your Nevo Butler to control entertainment devices! 

QuickSet enables you to instantly discover, control, and interact with existing entertainment devices within the home. Connect to thousands of Works with QuickSet devices, including TVs, set-top-boxes, over-the-top boxes, soundbars, and use your voice to control them through the QuickSet Cloud Video skill. 

Using easy voice commands, you can tune to your favorite channel, launch an app on Roku, or simply adjust the volume of your entertainment devices. 

Try saying:

"Alexa, turn on the TV"

"Alexa, tune to CNN"

"Alexa, go to channel 202"

"Alexa, increase volume by 30%"

"Alexa, lower the volume"

"Alexa, mute the TV" 

"Alexa, switch to HDMI 2 on my TV"

"Alexa, launch Netflix"
